name: kntnt-global-styles
description: Manages a global CSS file editable in the block editor.

scripts.build: wp-scripts build --webpack-src-dir=src && mv js/*.css css/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.create-dist: mkdir -p dist/kntnt-global-styles && cp -r classes css js languages *.php dist/kntnt-global-styles/ && cd dist && zip -r kntnt-global-styles.zip kntnt-global-styles/
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run makepot && npm run create-dist
